stack:stack.stack:script:
mkdir -p /etc/pki/tls/private mkdir -p /etc/pki/tls/certs
/usr/bin/openssl genpkey -algorithm RSA \ -out /etc/pki/tls/private/localhost.key \ -pkeyopt rsa_keygen_bits:2048
/usr/bin/openssl req -utf8 -new \ -key /etc/pki/tls/private/localhost.key \ -x509 -days 2000 -set_serial 0 \ -out /etc/pki/tls/certs/localhost.crt \ -config /etc/security/ca/ca.cfg -batch
<Directory /var/www/html/install> Options FollowSymLinks Indexes ExecCGI AllowOverride None Require all granted </Directory>
# HTTPS access for serving kickstart files
<Directory /var/www/html/install/sbin> AllowOverride None SSLRequireSSL SSLVerifyClient None Require all granted </Directory>
# allow all access to the pallets RPMS <Directory /var/www/html/install/pallets> DirectoryIndex /install/pallets/index.cgi Require all granted </Directory>
# allow all access to the carts RPMS <Directory /var/www/html/install/carts> Require all granted </Directory>
SSLCACertificateFile /etc/apache2/ssl.ca/ca-bundle
mkdir -p /export/stack/pallets chmod ao+rx /export/stack chmod ao+rx /export/stack/pallets
mkdir -p /etc/apache2/ssl.ca cp /etc/security/ca/ca.crt /etc/apache2/ssl.ca/
# Makefile to build the ca-bundle for HTTPS authentication.
CERTS = $(wildcard *.crt)
ca-bundle: $(CERTS) cat $(CERTS) > $@
clean: rm ca-bundle
make -C /etc/apache2/ssl.ca
